title: Lizzo Joins The Bert Show To Talk Fears And Her New Album "Special!"
description:
Bert sat down with Lizzo (virtually) and got DEEP with icon Lizzo as she opened up about her new album "Special", how she keeps herself grounded, and the one thing a fan said to her that she’ll *never* forget.
